value:
You know what you deserve even
more than all these gifts? You need
a break, $Nu!

My brother always gives the most
amazing gifts. I can't wait to see
what he comes up with this year.

Sephiran and Bernadetta are pitching
in with the festival, huh? I, um...better
give them a hand.

Festivals can be pretty exhausting,
but the cute clothes make it worth
the effort.

You ever wonder how great these
festivals would be if Claude used his
scheming talent for party planning?

Brrr! Could you show me to the fire?
I can't believe I agreed to come all
this way for $Nf...

A festival is pretty much the only time
I'm likely to overdo it. I can never
resist a good party.

What do you mean I could be doing
more? I've literally never worked
harder than this in my entire life.

Huh? No, that was my pre-lunch nap
break. This is my post-lunch stretch
break. Totally different breaks.

Oh, is this for me? How lovely! You
wouldn't spoil this moment by asking
me to work harder, would you?

Hilda here! Hm? You want help with
the winter festival? I'll do it, but don't
get your hopes up too much, OK?

I've got to be honest with you. All this
giving has worn me out. Receiving
gifts is so much easier!$k$pIt's been fun, though. And, I have to
say, I feel like I maybe learned
something this winter festival.$k$pPeople don't just smile when you
come through for them with a great
gift. They positively sparkle.$k$pThat kind of cheer is nice to see. And
to know I had a hand in it is... Well,
it's something, that's for sure!$k$pI don't know if I'd go so far as to say
giving is BETTER than getting. Let's
face it, that just wouldn't be me.$k$pEven so—thanks for showing me the
power of generosity. Now, let's enjoy
ourselves, $Nu!
そーれっ！
邪魔よー！
ああっ
Hey now!
Got you something big and sweet!
You're oh-so welcome!
Hilda the winter fairy!
I'm just warming up!
But where's my present...
Phew
What do you think of my winter look? Cute, right?
Guh! I know this is a festival, but don't you think you're going a little overboard?
Oh, I wouldn't dream of asking you for a present, but if you're offering... Some sweets would be nice.
Delivering presents is grueling labor for a delicate flower like me. If only somebody would do it for me...
Sure, I used to love playing in the snow! Then I turned 11.
Aw, everything's so shiny and beautiful. I wish my brother were here to see this.
Don't you worry, there's an extra-special present in your future... Once I think of one...
Holly jolly Hilda!
Do I have to?
It's so COLD!
